verses.roman:
rāmānanda-rāya tabe prabhure vasāilā
vījanādi kari' prabhura śrama ghucāilā

synonyms: rāmānanda-rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; tabe—at that time; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vasāilā—made to sit down; vījana-ādi kari'-fanning and so on; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrama—fatigue; ghucāilā—dissipated.
translation: At that time, Rāmānanda Rāya made the Lord sit down and dissipated His fatigue by fanning Him.
